accessibilityHint: Actions for this toot, such as its posted user, toot itself

alert.title: Confirm blocking instance {{instance}} ?
alert.message:
Mostly you can mute or block certain user.

After blocking instance, all its content including followers from this instance will be removed!

alert.title: Confirm deleting?
alert.message: All boosts and favourites will be cleared, including all replies.

alert.title: Confirm deleting and repost?
alert.message: All boosts and favourites will be cleared, including all replies.
